vecHighlight.strDescription: Complete all Chapters on âˆž Climax difficulty.
Complete half of all Alfheim portals.
While never setting foot on the ground, grab enemies 10 times using Kulshedra.
Taunt and defeat five plus angered enemies while taking no damage. Gaze of Despair may be equipped.
Earn Platinum Medals during Verse 1 and Verse 2 of Chapter 14.
Kill an enemy by jumping on top of them.
Obtain seven complete Angelic Hymn Gold LPs.
Complete Chapters 14 through the Epilogue on Hard difficulty.

vecAchievedHidden.strDescription: Complete Chapters 12 and 13 on Normal difficulty.
Complete Chapters 14 through the Epilogue on Normal difficulty.
Complete Chapters 12 and 13 on Hard difficulty.
Complete Chapters 14 through the Epilogue on Hard difficulty.

data.strFullDescription:
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/1_Dragon-Transform.jpg?t=1670260448[/img]

From PlatinumGamesâ€™ legendary director Hideki Kamiya of Resident Evil and Devil May Cry fame, SEGA brings one of the most universally acclaimed character action games of all time to PC. 

Bayonetta. The last survivor of an ancient witch clan who keep the balance between light, dark and chaos. Entombed to protect herself â€“ and the world as we know it â€“ Bayonetta is discovered and revived after 500 years, sparking a chain of events with cataclysmic repercussions.

Thrust straight into battle, with only one clue to her past, Bayonetta must discover the truth and fight for the future. Her daunting conquest sees her face off against countless angelic enemies and giant foes in a game of 100% pure action.

[b]BAYONETTA ON PC IS BEST EXPERIENCED WITH A CONTROLLER.[/b]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/2_Foot-Flurry-+-Heel-Kick-2.jpg?t=1670260448[/img]

[b]Features[/b]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/BAYO_BULLETPOINT_18x18_2.png?t=1670260448[/img]   [b]Deadly Grace[/b]
An alluring, stylish and all-action heroine unlike anyone else on the gaming landscape, Bayonetta is ready to push your senses to the limit.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/BAYO_BULLETPOINT_18x18_2.png?t=1670260448[/img]   [b]Climax Action[/b]
Over-the-top action in extreme environments resulting in continuous high levels of tension and excitement â€“ Bayonetta pushes the genre into new realms of intensity.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/BAYO_BULLETPOINT_18x18_2.png?t=1670260448[/img]   [b]Extravagant Combat[/b]
Bayonetta wields an impressive arsenal of weapons through an intuitive and fluid combat system, unleashing deadly combos and special attacks with devastating results.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/3_Guillotine-Smash-2.jpg?t=1670260448[/img]

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/BAYO_BULLETPOINT_18x18_2.png?t=1670260448[/img]   [b]Supernatural Powers[/b]
Unleash gruesome torture attacks such as the Iron Maiden, Guillotine and more to finish off enemies and send them to hell.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/BAYO_BULLETPOINT_18x18_2.png?t=1670260448[/img]   [b]Full Steam Support[/b]
Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud Save, Trading Cards, Leader Boards, and Big Picture Mode.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/BAYO_BULLETPOINT_18x18_2.png?t=1670260448[/img]   [b]Enhanced PC Graphics Options[/b]
Unlocked resolutions up to 4K, anti-aliasing, anisotropic filtering, SSAO lighting, scalable texture and shadow quality, and more.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/BAYO_BULLETPOINT_18x18_2.png?t=1670260448[/img]   [b]English and Japanese Voice Overs[/b]
Freely switch languages and subtitles at any time.

[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/460790/extras/4_Bullet-Witch.jpg?t=1670260448[/img]
data.strSnippet: PlatinumGamesâ€™ universally acclaimed action masterpiece finally comes to PC. Experience the over-the-top stylish action in 60fps at unlocked HD resolutions. The definitive way to play: being bad never felt so good.
